name: M13Checkbox
summary: A customizable checkbox for iOS that mimics the checkbox found on OS X, and Safari.
description: A customizable checkbox for iOS that mimics the checkbox found on OS X, and Safari. M13Checkbox is a subclass of UIControl, and conforms to all of its protocols.
